sentences.english: Jerry made some chop about the way I dress.
sentences.chinese: 杰里就我的穿着说了些刻薄话。

sentences.english: Cinderella lives with her cruel stepmother and two selfish stepsisters, who, jealous of her beauty and sweet temper, treat her as a servant.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘和他刻薄的后母与自私的姐姐住在一起。

sentences.english: She’s always on pins and needles, waiting for some cutting remark.
sentences.chinese: 她总是等待别人说一些刻薄尖锐的话。

sentences.english: Never be afraid to test yourself by your critic's words.
sentences.chinese: 千万不用害怕接受尖酸刻薄言词的考验。

sentences.english: Do not think I shall say a word of sting or bitterness.
sentences.chinese: 不要以为我会对你说一个刻薄的字，说一句愤恨的话。

sentences.english: ‘With her acid tongue, she was ­ruthless with him, ’ said one friend.
sentences.chinese: “她用刻薄的语气无情的对待他，”一个朋友说。”

sentences.english: Yes, he has an acerbic sense of humor that sometimes offends people.
sentences.chinese: 没错，他有种尖酸刻薄的幽默感，有时会得罪人。

sentences.english: He choked back a sharp reply.
sentences.chinese: 他把到了嘴边的一句刻薄话咽了回去。

sentences.english: I decided to overlook his unkindness .
Usually we are more satirical from vanity than malice.
sentences.chinese: 通常，人们的尖酸刻薄来自于虚荣心而非恶意。

sentences.english: Sometimes you'll just have to deal with Internet meanies and grow that thick skin.
sentences.chinese: 有事你只是需要对待网络刻薄鬼并且变得脸皮厚一点。

sentences.english: When the class ended, he wondered why he didn't hear the cruel taunts of his fellow students.
sentences.chinese: 下课后，他纳闷儿同学们为什么没刻薄地奚落他。

sentences.english: The mean girl sneered at the poor girl's cheap clothes.
sentences.chinese: 这个刻薄的女孩讥嘲那穷女孩的廉价衣服。

sentences.english: "Never mind your immortal soul, " she said tartly.
sentences.chinese: “千万不要提及你不朽的灵魂，”她刻薄地说。

sentences.english: It was too frivolous for her to answer.
sentences.chinese: 这句话太刻薄了，她不愿回答。

sentences.english: Kurek is speaking a truth both simple and bitter.
sentences.chinese: 库雷克的话既简洁又刻薄，不过确实是个事实。

definition: cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
